title: Buchter-Top Secret:BRD(legal non-existence of Germany)(2007)
description:
For english-only speaking:
This book is in german language. English title would be: Top secret: BRD - Evidence of non-existence of Federal Republic of Germany (2007). Sven B. Buchter's unique book exposes probably the greatest legal scandal since the formation of BRD after World war 2. Based entirely on official documents it presents a case of legal non-existence of a state that we call BRD (Federal Republic of Germany). In other words, the author explains that the whole thing is a scam of gigantic proportions and that all Germans are in reality stateless. 190 pages, some documents.
